# 0xFLOW Agency

> The Intelligence Age is Here.

0xFLOW is a next-generation engineering agency bridging the gap between traditional software development and autonomous intelligence. We architect systems that think, learn, and evolve.

## Key Resources

- [Full Website Content](https://0xflow.dev/llms-full.txt): A complete markdown representation of our landing page, including our manifesto, capabilities, and systems.
- [Services](https://0xflow.dev/services): Detailed breakdown of our engineering and AI capabilities.
- [Contact](mailto:hello@0xflow.dev): Get in touch to start a project.

## Core Capabilities

- **Integration**: Injecting cognitive perception into existing stacks.
- **Velocity**: Engineering high-velocity prototypes that feel finished from Day One.
- **Automation**: Architecting self-healing workflows that operate 24/7.
